item.title: Ani add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Being crazy isn't enough." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I have heard there are troubles of more than one kind. Some come from ahead and some come from behind. But I've bought a big bat. I'm all ready you see. Now my troubles are going to have troubles with me!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "How did it get so late so soon?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Adults are just obsolete children and the hell with them." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "So be sure when you step, Step with care and great tact. And remember that life's A Great Balancing Act. And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and ¾ percent guaranteed) Kid, you'll move mountains." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I'm afraid that sometimes you'll play lonely games too. Games you can't win 'cause you'll play against you." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I know, up on top you are seeing great sights, but down here at the bottom we, too, should have rights." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "He who makes a beast out of himself gets rid of the pain of being a man." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I’m glad we had the times together just to laugh and sing a song, seems like we just got started and then before you know it, the times we had together were gone." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The storm starts, when the drops start dropping When the drops stop dropping then the storm starts stopping." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You’ll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Words and pictures are yin and yang. Married, they produce a progeny more interesting than either parent." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Things may happen and often do to people as brainy and footsy as you" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Just tell yourself, Duckie, you're real quite lucky." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "My alphabet starts with this letter called yuzz. It s the letter I use to spell yuzz a ma tuzz. You ll be sort of surprised what there is to be found once you go beyond Z and start poking around " -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "For a host, above all, must be kind to his guests." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Ani add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Ani add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Ani add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe
